languages.text: "Вам ли не знать, сколь утомителен и долог процесс престолонаследия". {n}Кассия громко вздыхает.{/n} "Пока весь Дом готовится к Большому Совету, на котором и пройдет официальная церемония передачи титула от покойной Тисифоны ко мне... я решила остаться подле вас. Еще чуть-чуть насладиться беспечной свободой. Ибо как только долг призовет, нам будет суждено попрощаться".

traits.locale_text: "Вам ли не знать, сколь утомителен и долог процесс престолонаследия". {n}Кассия громко вздыхает.{/n} "Пока весь Дом готовится к Большому Совету, на котором и пройдет официальная церемония передачи титула от покойной Тисифоны ко мне... я решила остаться подле вас. Еще чуть-чуть насладиться беспечной свободой. Ибо как только долг призовет, нам будет суждено попрощаться".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."
languages.original_text: "Вам ли не знать, сколь утомителен и долог процесс престолонаследия". {n}Кассия громко вздыхает.{/n} "Пока весь Дом готовится к Большому Совету, на котором и пройдет официальная церемония передачи титула от покойной Тисифоны ко мне... я решила остаться подле вас. Еще чуть-чуть насладиться беспечной свободой. Ибо как только долг призовет, нам будет суждено попрощаться".

I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “在所有人里，你应该最清楚继承家族这个过程有多么冗长，多么令人厌烦。”{n}卡西娅重重地叹了口气。{/n}“我的整个家族都在忙着召开全体议会，而我将在议会上隆重继承已故的提西福涅的头衔……我已经决定，继续留在你身边，再享受一下这种无忧无虑的自由。因为一旦我的家族召集我履行职责，我恐怕就只能与你道别了。”
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

languages.text: «Si hay alguien que entienda lo larga y pesada que puede resultar una sucesión, es usted». {n}Cassia suspira profundamente.{/n} «Mientras mi casa entera se prepara para el gran consejo en el que heredaré ceremonialmente el cargo de la difunta Tisiphone... he elegido permanecer a su lado. Para disfrutar un poco más de esta libertad despreocupada. En cuanto el deber me reclame, deberemos despedirnos».
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.locale_text: «Si hay alguien que entienda lo larga y pesada que puede resultar una sucesión, es usted». {n}Cassia suspira profundamente.{/n} «Mientras mi casa entera se prepara para el gran consejo en el que heredaré ceremonialmente el cargo de la difunta Tisiphone... he elegido permanecer a su lado. Para disfrutar un poco más de esta libertad despreocupada. En cuanto el deber me reclame, deberemos despedirnos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「継承には時間がかかり、手間のかかるプロセスであることを、誰よりもあなたが知るべきです」{n}カシアは大きくため息をつく。{/n}「家中が大評議会の準備で忙しくしています。私は亡きティシフォンの称号を儀式的に受け継ぐことになっていますが…私はあなたの側にいることに決めました。この気ままな自由をもう少しだけ楽しむために。任務のために召集されたら、すぐに別れを告げなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.locale_text: 「継承には時間がかかり、手間のかかるプロセスであることを、誰よりもあなたが知るべきです」{n}カシアは大きくため息をつく。{/n}「家中が大評議会の準備で忙しくしています。私は亡きティシフォンの称号を儀式的に受け継ぐことになっていますが…私はあなたの側にいることに決めました。この気ままな自由をもう少しだけ楽しむために。任務のために召集されたら、すぐに別れを告げなければなりません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gerade Ihr solltet wissen, dass eine Nachfolge ein langwieriger, ermüdender Prozess ist." {n}Cassia seufzt tief.{/n} "Während mein gesamtes Haus damit beschäftigt ist, einen Großen Rat vorzubereiten, bei dem ich in einer feierlichen Zeremonie den Titel der verstorbenen Tisiphone erben soll ... habe ich entschieden, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Um noch ein klein wenig von dieser sorglosen Freiheit zu genießen. Denn sobald ich zu meiner Pflicht gerufen werde, müssen wir Abschied nehmen."
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.locale_text: "Gerade Ihr solltet wissen, dass eine Nachfolge ein langwieriger, ermüdender Prozess ist." {n}Cassia seufzt tief.{/n} "Während mein gesamtes Haus damit beschäftigt ist, einen Großen Rat vorzubereiten, bei dem ich in einer feierlichen Zeremonie den Titel der verstorbenen Tisiphone erben soll ... habe ich entschieden, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Um noch ein klein wenig von dieser sorglosen Freiheit zu genießen. Denn sobald ich zu meiner Pflicht gerufen werde, müssen wir Abschied nehmen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Vous savez mieux que quiconque que les successions sont des processus complexes qui traînent parfois en longueur. Pendant que ma maison s'affaire aux préparatifs de la cérémonie du grand conseil qui me permettra d'hériter du titre de Tisiphone... j'ai décidé de rester à vos côtés, pour profiter encore un peu de cette liberté insouciante. Mais dès que mon devoir m'appellera, nous devrons nous dire adieu. »
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Vous savez mieux que quiconque que les successions sont des processus complexes qui traînent parfois en longueur. Pendant que ma maison s'affaire aux préparatifs de la cérémonie du grand conseil qui me permettra d'hériter du titre de Tisiphone... j'ai décidé de rester à vos côtés, pour profiter encore un peu de cette liberté insouciante. Mais dès que mon devoir m'appellera, nous devrons nous dire adieu. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Halefiyet işinin uzun ve yorucu olduğunu en iyi sen bilirsin." {n}Cassia derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tüm Hanem, rahmetli Tisiphone'nin ünvanının törenle bana geçeceği Yüce Konsey için hazırlık yapmakla meşgulken... Bense senin yanında kalmaya karar verdim. Bu gamsız özgürlüğün tadını biraz daha çıkarabileyim diye. Vazifemin başına geçmeye çağrılır çağrılmaz yollarımız ayrı düşecek."
languages.original_text: "You of all people should know that succession is a lengthy and tiresome process." {n}Cassia sighs heavily.{/n} "While my entire House is busy preparing for a Grand Council at which I am to ceremonially inherit the late Tisiphone's title... I have decided to remain by your side. To relish just a little more of this carefree liberty. For as soon as I'm summoned to do my duty, we must say our farewells."

traits.locale_text: "Halefiyet işinin uzun ve yorucu olduğunu en iyi sen biliyorsundur." {n}Cassia derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tüm Hanem, rahmetli Tisiphone'nin ünvanının törenle bana geçeceği Yüce Konsey için hazırlık yapmakla meşgulken... Bense senin yanında kalmaya karar verdim. Bu gamsız özgürlüğün tadını biraz daha çıkarabileyim diye. Vazifemin başına geçmeye çağrılır çağrılmaz yollarımız ayrı düşecek."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
